column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Not only did we find one
column2: but two hairs in our cheese plate. I have never been so disguisted. We told the waiter
column3: who returned with a fresh cheese plate. The manager also came over and apologized
column4: and gave us a discount on the bill
column5: but overall we were dissapointed with both the service and the quality of this place.
